descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Dive into "BallSort" a thrilling Meta Quest adventure! Sort vibrant balls into tubes with hand-tracking or controllers in a stunning 3D realm. Choose VR mode for a vivid, distraction-free cosmos or mixed reality to merge gameplay with your space. Stunning visuals and immersive sound make it easy to start, hard to master. Customize your setting and tackle a fresh strategic challenge. Get it now on the Meta Quest store and unleash your skills!
Hand-tracking feels natural, while controllers offer precision. VR mode surrounds you in a colorful universe; mixed reality turns any spot into a playground. You decide how to play.
Optimized for Meta Quest, it boasts crisp graphics—bright balls pop against cosmic or calm backdrops. 3D audio brings every drop to life. Simple at first, it tests your wits as tubes multiply. Play casually or dive deep—it’s up to you.
No extra gear needed—just your headset and curiosity. Lightweight and versatile, it suits quick or long sessions. Master the chaos in this vivid escape. Download "BallSort" now and rise to the challenge!
